status_definitions.warning: Met but with concerns - review recommended

severity_definitions.critical: Will result in rejection if not met
severity_definitions.high: May result in rejection or significant score reduction

verification_categories.description: Basic submission format and completeness requirements

checks.description: Proposal submitted by October 31, 2025 at 2:00 PM CST
checks.notes: Deadline per Amendment 0003. Late submissions will not be accepted
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Submission by deadline

checks.description: Proposal submitted as 4 separate PDF files: Volume I, II, III, IV
checks.notes: Per submission instructions page 87-97
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Four separate volume files

checks.description: Files named exactly: RPRTech_Phase I-Technical.pdf, RPRTech_Past Perf.pdf, RPRTech_Price.pdf, RPRTech_Ofr.pdf
checks.evidence_required: Screenshot of files with names visible
checks.notes: Per submission instructions. Exact naming required
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Correct file naming convention

checks.requirement: All PDFs readable and not corrupted
checks.description: All 4 PDFs open successfully and display correctly
checks.verification_method: Open each PDF, verify all pages display
checks.notes: Corrupted files will not be evaluated
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All PDFs readable and not corrupted

checks.description: Submitted via SAM.gov or designated VA portal per RFP instructions
checks.verification_method: Verify submission portal matches RFP instructions
checks.notes: Check RFP for designated submission method
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Submitted via correct portal

checks.description: Volume I does not exceed 35 pages (excluding cover and TOC)
checks.verification_method: Count pages excluding cover and TOC
checks.notes: Per RFP page 93. Exceeding limit will result in rejection
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Volume I page limit ≤35 pages

checks.description: Volume I clearly identifies Movius as the proposed platform
checks.notes: Must identify specific platform being proposed
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Movius platform identified

checks.description: Volume I Section 2 addresses ALL 22 items from Attachment D.1
checks.verification_method: Check Section 2 includes all D.1 items
checks.evidence_required: Checklist of 22 items, all checked off
checks.notes: Missing any D.1 item may result in rejection
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All 22 D.1 items addressed

checks.requirement: D.1 responses show HOW not just YES
checks.description: D.1 responses explain specific features and implementation approach, not just state compliance
checks.verification_method: Review D.1 responses for detail and specificity
checks.notes: Per Q&A guidance, must explain HOW requirements are met
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: D.1 responses show HOW not just YES

checks.description: Volume I Section 3 answers ALL 8 questions from Attachment D.2
checks.verification_method: Check Section 3 includes all 8 questions with answers
checks.notes: Missing any D.2 answer may result in rejection
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All 8 D.2 questions answered

checks.description: D.2 responses are thorough, not just yes/no, provide examples where helpful
checks.notes: Per requirement guidance
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: D.2 responses complete and thoughtful

checks.description: Volume I Section 4 demonstrates FedRAMP Moderate authorization OR In-Process status
checks.verification_method: Check Section 4 includes FedRAMP certificate or In-Process letter
checks.notes: PWS B.4.5.10 requires FedRAMP Moderate. Q&A #18 confirmed mandatory
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: FedRAMP Moderate demonstrated

checks.description: Volume I Section 5 details FIPS-199 Moderate impact level
checks.notes: Required per PWS Section B.4.3
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: FIPS-199 Moderate characterized

checks.description: Volume I Section 6 provides realistic 90-day deployment plan
checks.notes: Per PWS requirement for 90-day readiness
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: 90-day implementation plan included

checks.description: Volume I Section 7 describes 24/7/365 support operations
checks.notes: PWS requires 24/7/365 support
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: 24/7/365 support model described

checks.description: Volume I contains absolutely NO pricing information
checks.verification_method: Search Volume I for any dollar amounts, costs, pricing
checks.notes: CRITICAL: Including pricing in Volume I will result in REJECTION
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: NO PRICING in Volume I

checks.description: Volume II does not exceed 10 pages
checks.notes: Per RFP page 93
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Volume II page limit ≤10 pages

checks.description: Volume II includes at least 3 relevant past performance contracts
checks.notes: Should demonstrate similar scope/complexity
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: 3-5 relevant contracts included

checks.description: Each contract includes: number, agency, period, scope, POC name/phone/email
checks.verification_method: Review each contract entry for completeness
checks.notes: VA will contact references - info must be current
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All contract information complete

checks.description: All POC contacts have been verified as current and reachable
checks.notes: VA may contact references - unreachable contacts reflect poorly
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: POC contact information verified current

checks.description: All required CLINs have unit prices entered (base + options)
checks.verification_method: Check price schedule, verify no blank CLINs
checks.notes: Missing CLIN pricing may result in rejection
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All CLINs priced

checks.description: Every price formatted as XX.XX (two decimal places, no more/less)
checks.notes: Per pricing instructions - exact format required
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All prices exactly 2 decimal places

checks.description: All extended prices = Unit Price × Quantity (exact, no rounding)
checks.notes: Excel formulas should handle this automatically
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Extended prices calculated correctly

checks.description: RPR Tech CLINs total more than 50% of contract value
checks.verification_method: Calculate work split from CLIN totals
checks.notes: VAAR 852.219-75 requirement - will be REJECTED if <50%
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: RPR Tech work split >50%

checks.description: Work split showing RPR vs Movius percentages is documented
checks.evidence_required: Work split sheet in Excel or separate doc
checks.notes: Needed for VAAR certificate completion
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Work split calculation documented

checks.description: Base year + 4 option years + 6-month extension all priced
checks.verification_method: Verify pricing tabs for all periods
checks.notes: Per CLIN structure
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Option years priced

verification_categories.description: Solicitation, offer and award requirements - MOST CRITICAL VOLUME

checks.description: SF 1449 form has signature, name/title, and date in blocks 30a, 30b, 30c
checks.notes: Unsigned offer is not valid
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: SF 1449 blocks 30a-30c signed

checks.description: Amendment acknowledgment document lists all 3 amendments (0001, 0002, 0003)
checks.notes: CRITICAL: Missing even ONE amendment will result in REJECTION per SF 1449
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All 3 amendments acknowledged

checks.description: VAAR 852.219-75 Certificate is present in Volume IV
checks.notes: MOST CRITICAL DOCUMENT. Government will NOT consider offers without it
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: VAAR 852.219-75 Certificate included

checks.description: VAAR Certificate states specific percentage >50% that RPR Tech will self-perform
checks.verification_method: Read certificate, verify percentage stated and >50%
checks.notes: Must state exact percentage, not just '>50%'. Must match Volume III calculation
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: VAAR Certificate states >50% RPR Tech

checks.requirement: VAAR Certificate signed under penalty of perjury
checks.description: VAAR Certificate signed by authorized official under penalty of perjury statement
checks.verification_method: Check signature and penalty statement present
checks.notes: False statements can result in criminal prosecution
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: VAAR Certificate signed under penalty of perjury

checks.description: Signed OEM letter from Movius on letterhead authorizing RPR Tech for this RFP
checks.verification_method: Check for OEM letter, verify letterhead, signature, date
checks.notes: Required to demonstrate authority to resell Movius solution
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: OEM Authorization Letter from Movius

checks.requirement: OEM letter on Movius official letterhead
checks.description: OEM letter uses Movius company letterhead (not plain paper)
checks.notes: Letterhead authenticates document
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: OEM letter on Movius official letterhead

checks.requirement: OEM letter signed by authorized Movius rep
checks.description: OEM letter signed by person with authority to bind Movius
checks.notes: Should be executive or sales leadership
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: OEM letter signed by authorized Movius rep

checks.description: OEM letter date is October 2025 (current)
checks.notes: Should be recent/current
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: OEM letter dated October 2025

checks.description: SDVOSB certification letter or documentation included
checks.notes: Required for SDVOSB set-aside
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: SDVOSB certification included

checks.description: RPR Tech SDVOSB status is current and active in SAM.gov
checks.notes: Verification must be active at time of submission
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: SDVOSB status verified in SAM.gov

checks.description: FAR 52.212-3 Offeror Representations and Certifications completed
checks.notes: May reference SAM.gov profile or complete in proposal
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: FAR 52.212-3 representations completed

checks.description: All documents requiring signatures are signed by authorized officials
checks.verification_method: Review all docs, check for signatures
checks.notes: Unsigned documents may result in rejection
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All required signatures obtained

checks.description: All signatories are authorized to bind RPR Tech to contract terms
checks.notes: Should be officers or designated representatives
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Authorized signatories have proper authority

checks.description: All document dates are October 2025 and consistent across volumes
checks.notes: Minor issue but should be clean
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All dates current and consistent

checks.description: Movius platform name and version identical in Volumes I, II, III, IV
checks.verification_method: Search all volumes for platform references
checks.notes: Inconsistency suggests lack of attention to detail
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Platform identification consistent

checks.requirement: Work split matches across Vol III and IV
checks.description: Work split percentage in Volume III calculation matches VAAR Certificate statement in Volume IV
checks.verification_method: Compare Vol III work split to Vol IV VAAR cert percentage
checks.notes: Mismatch will raise serious questions
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Work split matches across Vol III and IV

checks.description: RPR Tech name, address, UEI, CAGE code consistent across all volumes
checks.verification_method: Check company info in all volumes
checks.notes: Should match SAM.gov registration
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Company information consistent

checks.description: FedRAMP certificate details in Volume I match OEM letter references in Volume IV
checks.notes: Inconsistency raises credibility questions
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: FedRAMP certificate details consistent

checks.description: All volumes proofread for grammar, spelling, consistency
checks.notes: Quality presentation matters
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All volumes proofread

checks.description: Fonts, margins, headers, footers consistent across all volumes
checks.notes: Professional appearance
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All volumes formatted consistently

checks.description: All internal page references, section references accurate
checks.notes: Broken references look sloppy
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: All references and cross-references accurate

checks.description: All template placeholder text replaced with actual content
checks.notes: Placeholder text will result in rejection
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: No [PLACEHOLDER] text remaining

checks.description: RPR Tech management has reviewed and approved final proposal
checks.notes: Final sign-off before submission
checks.acceptance_criteria: Check passes verification: Management final approval obtained

critical_path_items: v1_011: NO PRICING in Volume I

step_4.name: PDF Generation & Testing
tasks: Test PDF opening on multiple devices

go_no_go_decision.go_conditions: All critical items pass + management approval + time to submit
go_no_go_decision.no_go_conditions: Any critical failure that cannot be fixed OR insufficient time to submit quality proposal

version_history.changes: Initial comprehensive compliance verification checklist created

enhancements_applied: RFP clause references and page numbers added

work_split_verification.description: Verify RPR Tech performs >50.01% of total contract value per VAAR 852.219-75
work_split_verification.acceptance_criteria: Calculation shows RPR Tech >= 50.01%, documented in Vol III and Vol IV
